title: Im stuck on the Alpha Client.
body:
Hello riot, im stuck at the alpha client and i cant change it to the old client(Legacy), i've tried on the login screen the "Lanch Legacy Client" and it didn't work so i tried the other one going Riot Games/League Of Legends/ RADS/system/user and put leagueClientOptIn = yes to no and saved it,
and it didn't work riot.. i am at patch 7.13 so please tell me what to do
